text: int main ( ) { int t , i , j , row [ 5 ] , arr [ 10 ] , a [ 10 ] ; scanf ( "%d" , & t ) ; for ( i = 0 ; i < t ; i ++ ) scanf ( "%d" , & row [ i ] ) ; int p = t ; while ( t != 0 ) { for ( i = 0 ; i < row [ p - t ] ; i ++ ) { arr [ i ] = 0 ; a [ i ] = 0 ; } for ( i = 0 ; i < row [ p - t ] ; i ++ ) { for ( j = 0 ; j <= i ; j ++ ) { scanf ( "%d" , & arr [ j ] ) ; a [ j ] = arr [ j ] + a [ j ] ; } } for ( i = 0 ; i < row [ p - t ] ; i ++ ) printf ( "%d\n" , a [ i ] ) ; t -- ; } }
